scripts.local: npm run setup-consul ; NODE_ENV=development ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/nodemon --watch src/server www/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/nyc ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/mocha --timeout 30000 --recursive -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.test-raw: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/nyc ${NODE_PATH}/.bin/mocha --timeout 30000 --recursive
scripts.setup-consul: curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_DATABASE} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/db-init/database ; curl -X PUT -d 'root' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/db-init/user ; curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/db-init/password; curl -X PUT -d 'true' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/db-init/populate-test-data; curl -X PUT -d ${REDIS_AUTH} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/redis/password; curl -X PUT -d 'svc_user' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/service-client/username; curl -X PUT -d 'test' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/service-client/password; curl -X PUT -d 'oidcCLIENT' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/service-client/client-key; curl -X PUT -d '91c0fabd17a9db3cfe53f28a10728e39b7724e234ecd78dba1fb05b909fb4ed98c476afc50a634d52808ad3cb2ea744bc8c3b45b7149ec459b5c416a6e8db242' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/user/service-client/client-secret
scripts.doc: npm run rest-doc ; npm run domain-doc
